long.para: Computes a decomposition such that A = Q * R, where Q is unitary and R is upper triangular respectively.

references.reference: Angelika Bunse-Gerstner, Ralph Byers, Volker Mehrmann, 'A Quaternion QR Algorithm', Numerische Mathematik, 55 (1), January 1989, 83-95, 10.1007/BF01395873
Gene H. Golub and Charles van Loan, Matrix Computations, 3rd edition, John Hopkins University Press, 1996.
